intro: Nintendo Switch™ exclusive! 4 Cyberfunks co-op play! Immersive SF battles with Ultra HD visuals! Breathtaking effects, weapon sounds captivate FPS experience!
description:
Experience the ultimate battle on a photorealistic SF battlefield and witness the emotional ending firsthand!
Utilize the unique characteristics of weapons categorized as Assault, Support, Sniper, and Engineer, Aim your firearms and use more precise controls,
Understand the missions for each game mode and participate in combat to complete special missions.

・Become a member of the Vega special forces unit as they take on the mighty Nemesis. Complete special missions on a SF battlefield.
・Experience thrilling battlefields rendered with photo-realistic graphics.
・Enjoy strategic gameplay utilizing the characteristics of 4 characters.
・4 Cyberfunk Characters! Assault (Rifle), Support (Shotgun), Sniper (Sniper Rifle), Engineer (SMG)
・Engage in the Deathmatch Mode where you can prove your superior combat skills in direct confrontation with enemies.
・Play the Domination Mode where you capture battle zones to secure tactically advantageous positions.
・Experience the Search and Destroy mode where you plant explosives in designated locations and defend against defusing attempts.
・Achieve victory by maximizing gun control with precise aiming and tilt systems.
・Feel the exhilaration of thrilling victories through teamwork.

The reality of SF combat that excites military fans!
Precise gun control that shines through the tension!
Be sure to enjoy [Exodus], the ultimate team-based single player FPS game where you fight alongside your comrades!

Synopsis
Human space exploration has entered a new era.
On an alien planet, a human-like life form, the Nemesis, was discovered along with valuable resources, and an exchange between the two sides began. 
At first, the Nemesis were seen as peaceful beings, and it seemed that Earth would enter a new era by coexisting with them.
However, the true intention of the Nemesis was to seize Earth's resources and dominate humanity. 
They infiltrated Earth in a cunning manner, hiding in various parts of the city and launching attacks at unexpected moments.
Nemesis had advanced weaponry and powerful biological weapons. Humanity was powerless to resist, and 
major cities fell quickly. 
In this crisis, a small group of survivors formed the Special Forces unit Vega and began to fight against Nemesis.
Through repeated battles, Vega reveals the shocking truth behind Nemesis' invasion. 
The purpose of Nemesis was not just to plunder resources. 
They had a plan to destroy Earth's environment and create a new species by injecting their genes into humanity.
Upon learning of this, Vega launched a daring operation. 
And after a fierce battle, they managed to raid Nemesis' base and eliminate their leader. 
However, Nemesis' invasion is still ongoing, and Vega prepares for the final battle with the fate of humanity at stake.
